channel.title: programming on RSI
channel.description: Recent content in programming on RSI

item.title: MalDev - 0x00
item.description: Por Igor Benevides Introduction Hello! My name is Igor and I’m a professional cybersecurity consultant and researcher. I currently own OSEP certification, and I’m going through OSED. I love to study about cybersecurity and I’m a part of the RSI (Residência da Segurança da Informação) project, which is an extension project for UFC (Universidade Federal do Ceará). The goal of this new series is to teach malware development for anyone interested in this theme.
